headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://*.googletagmanager.com https://stats.g.doubleclick.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com data:; img-src 'self' data: https://www.google-analytics.com; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'self'; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests

globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://*.google-analytics.com https://*.googletagmanager.com https://stats.g.doubleclick.net; style-src 'self' https://www.w3schools.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com data:; img-src 'self' data: https://www.google-analytics.com; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'self'; object-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests
